body_html: If someone from the TensorFlow team is still reading this thread, would it be possible to optionally ignore records that fail the CRC check instead of raising an exception? This would be an acceptable behavior during training.
body_text: If someone from the TensorFlow team is still reading this thread, would it be possible to optionally ignore records that fail the CRC check instead of raising an exception? This would be an acceptable behavior during training.
body: If someone from the TensorFlow team is still reading this thread, would it be possible to optionally ignore records that fail the CRC check instead of raising an exception? This would be an acceptable behavior during training.
